TRAINING_MESSAGE_01_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_01_Leader.text: Just relax, yeah? Let the wave carry ya.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_01_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_01_Trainee.text: Been a while since I've done any trainin'.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_02_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_02_Trainee.text: Mind if I use magic for this?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_03_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_03_Leader.text: The power of the dark cannot be acquired through study.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_03_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_03_Trainee.text: There is nothing more for me to learn.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_04_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_04_Trainee.text: Uuurgh... I think I'm getting butterflies...

TRAINING_MESSAGE_05_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_05_Leader.text: Always wanted to try bein' a hard-ass drill instructor. Let's do this!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_06_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_06_Leader.text: I've nae education programs installed, love.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_07_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_07_Leader.text: The true value of training comes when master and pupil are as one.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_07_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_07_Trainee.text: A warrior is defined by the sum of their accomplishments.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_08_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_08_Leader.text: I shall teach you the beauty in all things.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_08_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_08_Trainee.text: All is so I might improve my poetry.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_09_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_09_Leader.text: Let's start with the fundamentals! Leg day!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_09_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_09_Trainee.text: Come at me with all you got!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_10_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_10_Leader.text: You won't get any better just by firin' blindly!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_10_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_10_Trainee.text: There's no target I can't pierce!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_11_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_11_Leader.text: How does it feel to be taught by a familiar?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_11_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_11_Trainee.text: What good is training for a familiar?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_12_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_12_Leader.text: So I've become the master, have I? Very well.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_12_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_12_Trainee.text: I trust in my ability to learn anything but magic.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_13_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_13_Leader.text: Don't go expecting too much from a copy!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_13_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_13_Trainee.text: So I just copy what I see? Easy!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_14_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_14_Leader.text: Can you keep up with my intuition?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_14_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_14_Trainee.text: I'm going to be taught...by you? By YOU?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_15_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_15_Leader.text: The pupil's path begins with paying respect to the master.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_16_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_16_Leader.text: I would rather be the student than the teacher, but oh well.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_16_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_16_Trainee.text: Oh, how I thirst for new knowledge!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_17_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_17_Leader.text: What do you expect to learn from a killer?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_17_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_17_Trainee.text: What good is study when compared to death!?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_18_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_18_Leader.text: Follow the master! Disaster! It's time to get after!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_18_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_18_Trainee.text: I'm amped and wired! Synapses fired!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_19_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_19_Leader.text: I've no time to teach you. Do whatever ya want.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_23_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_23_Leader.text: Well, aren't we enthusiastic? Good for you.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_23_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_23_Trainee.text: Me? Train? You can't be serious.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_25_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_25_Trainee.text: Just try and make me train! I dare you!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_27_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_27_Leader.text: To improve oneself is an honorable pursuit.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_27_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_27_Trainee.text: Greater strength will grant me independence.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_28_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_28_Leader.text: Pay attention if you don't wanna tick me off.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_28_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_28_Trainee.text: Effort's just not, like, a witch thing. You know?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_29_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_29_Leader.text: Not sure I'm cut out for teaching...

TRAINING_MESSAGE_29_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_29_Trainee.text: Will I even remember any of this...?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_31_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_31_Leader.text: No skill worth learning comes easy.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_31_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_31_Trainee.text: I must not rely on one ability alone.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_32_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_32_Leader.text: Oooh, I'm in charge? I'll give ya hell!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_33_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_33_Leader.text: Let's be gettin' this over with so we can eat!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_33_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_33_Trainee.text: Never look down on a man of the sea!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_34_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_34_Leader.text: I didn't ask for this responsibility.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_34_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_34_Trainee.text: To learn from others is a fine thing!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_35_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_35_Leader.text: I will impart the wisdom of the priests of the Kosmos.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_35_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_35_Trainee.text: Teach me then, if you must.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_36_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_36_Leader.text: Being a carrier isn't easy. Think you can keep up?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_36_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_36_Trainee.text: Where do I start? Should I do some laps?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_37_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_37_Leader.text: Show me the fire in your soul!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_37_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_37_Trainee.text: Nothing gets the blood boiling like training!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_38_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_38_Trainee.text: Shall we start by reviewing our form?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_39_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_39_Leader.text: Feel the wind in your soul.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_39_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_39_Trainee.text: Nothing's better than a nice breeze while training.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_40_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_40_Leader.text: Lay the roots of your soul deep like a mighty forest!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_40_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_40_Trainee.text: My breathing is steadyâ€”I'm prepared for anything.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_41_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_41_Trainee.text: Is training something I can eat?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_42_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_42_Leader.text: How the heck did I get stuck on education duty?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_42_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_42_Trainee.text: Ugh, fine. Let's get this over with.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_43_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_43_Leader.text: As if a scarecrow could teach anyone anything!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_43_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_43_Trainee.text: Scarecrows can train too! Uh, right?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_44_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_44_Leader.text: I can't teach about anything but the people of the Imeru.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_44_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_44_Trainee.text: I'll do my best. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_45_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_45_Leader.text: I will devise a basic training curriculum.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_46_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_46_Leader.text: I've little need for a patron, but very well!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_46_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_46_Trainee.text: A new hero of legend takes to the stage!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_48_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_48_Leader.text: The biggest gun always wins. That's just how it is.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_48_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_48_Trainee.text: One can never have enough educational data.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_50_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_50_Leader.text: Your posture is simply wretched! Straighten that back!

TRAINING_MESSAGE_50_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_50_Trainee.text: One must always conduct themselves with grace.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_51_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_51_Leader.text: It is daily effort alone that shapes a knight.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_51_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_51_Trainee.text: I leave myself in your capable hands.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_52_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_52_Leader.text: Ah, just go ahead and do whatever.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_52_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_52_Trainee.text: Training? Heh. That takes me back.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_53_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_53_Leader.text: I shall impart to you training methods learned from the first emperor.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_53_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_53_Trainee.text: What's the point in learning? It's too late.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_54_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_54_Leader.text: Oh, sweet! I always wanted to be a teacher.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_54_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_54_Trainee.text: I don't have to write essays or anything, do I?

TRAINING_MESSAGE_55_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_55_Leader.text: I'll put together a devastatingly efficient training regimen.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_55_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_55_Trainee.text: Putting theory into practice is no easy feat.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_56_Leader.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_56_Leader.text: It's vital to invest your whole heart when practicing.

TRAINING_MESSAGE_56_Trainee.speaker: UI
TRAINING_MESSAGE_56_Trainee.text: Weight training is crucial for beautiful vocalization.
